article: ryuichi kiyonari bettered the donington park lap record to take put his buildbase bmw on to pole start for the easter monday opening round of the mce british superbike championship .
the japanese rider powered in a scorching time of one minute 29.455 seconds .
in doing so , he headed off the close attentions of james ellison on the jg speedfit kawasaki by just 0.029 secs .
